title: aDimaraliNaiyallaal
sahitya:
aDimalariNaiyallaal marugati avaniyil aRiyEnE



anupallavi



iDaruRum bavamenum kaDaliDai paDumuzhu

maDaiyinai eesaa nee kaiviDa ninaiyaadE unadutiru

(vaDi)



caraNam



ancupala vEDaraaTruncu nencaalippira

pancamidhil minciyadu sanchalamE sambuvE

kancanezhuttin un koDum sinamoDu varum

vencamadootarukku ancinEnukku unadu tiru

(vaDi)
